alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rutland and west central Windsor Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Killington, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Stockbridge, Pittsfield, Killington, Mendon, Bridgewater, Barnard, Chittenden, South Sherburne, Giffords Woods State Forest Park, North Sherburne, Gifford Woods State Park and West Bridgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
